Reviews.Title: great condition
Reviews.Author: Amazonaphile
Reviews.Content: This is an older model phone but it arrived in like new condition as promised and is working just fine. Nicely packaged and with plastic to protect the surfaces,  would recommend this seller. The phone is simple,  yet has a camera and is small and lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Glad we went back to Older model
Reviews.Author: Shutterbug
Reviews.Content: I had one of these for years, but made the mistake of dropping it into a bag with other items.  (Leaking fruit juice is an entirely different recovery issue than just water.)  I used it in travel around our state, and reception was not a problem, except for very isolated spots not reachable by any form of mobile communications.  So when we had reception problems at home after getting several models of Verizon Samsung, we decided to step back to this one.  So glad we did.The larger battery (with thicker back cover) is well worth the slight increase in thickness.Supplier shipped promptly.

Reviews.Title: Never again....
Reviews.Author: Debra Russell
Reviews.Content: This was not a good phone...I had to replace it after about three weeks. Never again. I realize it's an older model and hope that Motorola has improved on it.

Reviews.Title: did its job
Reviews.Author: Jessica White Cloud
Reviews.Content: i really needed a cheap phone to cut down my phone bill and found it here. shipped promptly and i loved having an old school phone. althought the texting was rough without a keyboard lol

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Damandan
Reviews.Content: This phone came without a battery cover and the display screen was not even attached to the phone. The vendor agreed to ship another to correct it and did, it showed up exactly the same if not worse. Do not trust the descriptions and buyer beware..

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: MIKE
Reviews.Content: Buying a used phone means you are taking a chance that someone is sending you something that works.  This thing lasted 3 days before the light burned out. Never again.  I then got smart.  Went to Target and bought a pre paid phone.  You can't use them for the first six months after your purchase with your regular phone line, but after that, if something happens to your other phone, you have an inexpensive replacement.  Have one set aside. You know how those warranties go....they've expired, or you hear...."that's not covered"

Reviews.Title: Not Pretty But Functional
Reviews.Author: User
Reviews.Content: The phone I received was pretty beat up, but it does work fine. The add might have mentioned that is was not in very good condition, cosmetically, but as I said it does work as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Eric W. Harlacher "Cheese Guru"
Reviews.Content: Phone is garbage. Works fine while plugged in. Won't charge however, so it dies immediately after unplugging. New phone shouldn't ship with a fried battery.

Reviews.Title: Good Seller
Reviews.Author: Marvin
Reviews.Content: Smooth transaction. Would purchase from seller again. Arrived on time. Item was as described. Good price. Thank you for making the buy so easy. If there was any draw back it would be there was no instruction booklet or user manual. But I was able to find that online.

Reviews.Title: Arrived broken, but phone was refunded
Reviews.Author: Kathy Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived  broken.  Thankfully the vendor responded to my post and has allowed me to return the phone.  Getting the refund is great, but what I really wanted was a working simple phone.
